Author: DumbassDragon
Text: Thank you so much. It is really hard to break those old habits, especially when it feels like all my hard work has metamorphosed into a pudgy stomach.  I'll try to test the scale later. :)  Also, thanks for the congratulations :) my new apartment makes me happy

Author: SemicolonButterfly
Text: It sounds like you’re working to make positive choices even when it gets uncomfortable, and that is very impressive. It’s sometimes hard to keep taking new actions when our brains are screaming at us to take the old ones! I hope you’ll be gentle with yourself. And congrats on the new place!   Regarding the scale - maybe see about calibrating/checking accuracy against a known weight? Especially if the number changed after moving the scale. (Mine seemed to give wonky readings even when I was just storing it in a closet between uses.)
